game.name: Hajimeow: Tiny Box Cat
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hajimeow: Tiny Box Cat is a cute companion that responds to every keystroke and mouse click by raising signs. With an integrated Pomodoro timer, this little buddy accompanies you through your daily tasks, making work and study sessions more enjoyable and focused.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hajimeow: Tiny Box Cat is a cute companion that responds to every keystroke and mouse click by raising signs. With an integrated Pomodoro timer, this little buddy accompanies you through your daily tasks, making work and study sessions more enjoyable and focused.
